task.title: Brownie
task.shortdesc: Faked recipe. No idea if this will work.

taskbody.context: This recipie is inspired by how I doctor my mother's ultimate brownie recipe. However, I didn't actually go look at the recipe to see if the proportions are correct.

step.cmd: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Lightly grease a 9" x 13" pan
Melt butter and chocolate in a pan over low heat. Remove from heat once melted and combined.
Add eggs, one at a time and combine.
Mix together salt, baking powder, flour, and dried cherries.
Fold dry ingredients into chocolate mixture.
Pour batter into pan and bake at 350.
Start testing for doneness after 30 minutes. The edges and top should look crusty, but the center may still be a little soft. A toothpick pushed into the center should come out mostly clean.
step.info: Crumbs are okay, uncooked batter is not. However, remember there may be melted chocolate chip where you're testing.
